name: Specs
tagline: A service for exposing specification files in version control via a nice web UI
body:
### Make your specifications visible.
Specs is a service that allows you to make specifications written in Gherkin (Cucumber) and stored in Git easily visible to people who don't want to dive into Git. Specs is in very early development, if you have a feature request please [raise it in GitHub](https://github.com/oss-specs/specs/issues), or even better create a pull request.

### Contributors
Specs is primarily developed and maintained by Jim Cresswell (@jimCresswell) and Stan Wozniak (@sponte).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
